name: Lazy Vraptor
profile:
Hi I'm an Australian that LOVES video games especially undertale, Pokémon, subnautica and batim.

I also love countryhumans, mainly the stereotype stuff, not so much the history 

Support me on patreon here :) 
https://www.patreon.com/LazyVraptorofficial 

I’m a huge movie nerd too, favourite movies are Disney and marvel ones like Venom (idc what you say it was amazing), zootopia, lilo and stitch, xmen/Wolverine/Logan and literally EVERY MCU MOVIE EVER
But my favourite movies of all time are earth to echo and into the storm

I also have snakes as pets, that’s cool right? XD

I love to draw and I'm trying to become an animator please subscribe to my channel to support me in making original and animation memes
